remarks: The kernels of nonzero functionals are hyperplanes.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Feb-2015.)
statement:
lduallkr3.h $e |- H = ( LSHyp ` W ) $.
lduallkr3.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lduallkr3.k $e |- K = ( LKer ` W ) $.
lduallkr3.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
lduallkr3.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` D ) $.
lduallkr3.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lduallkr3.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lduallkr3 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( K ` G ) e. H <-> G =/= .0. ) ) $.
